column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////My date and I arrived 10 minutes early for our 8 pm reservation on a Friday and were seated right away. Cafe BaBaReeba was packed and there was definitely a wait...but with a glass of delicious sangria in your hand
column2: the wait doesn't matter. Our waiter was very attentive with constant refills on our white sangria
column3: we went with the half pitcher. All of our choices were a hit
column7: and spanish sausages...however the spanish sausage was supposed to be spanish meatballs
column8: so a minor slip on the servers part here
column9: but we enjoyed our substitution. The baked goat cheese was my favorite...perfect consistency and very tasty with garlic toast.
